body.gathalast: Dandhañhi karoto puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano.
Na tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, dukkho pāpassa uccayo.
Tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, sukho puññassa uccayo.
body.gatha1: Pāpopi passati bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
Bhadropi passati pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;
body.gathalast: Dhīro pūrati puññassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācinaṃ.
body.gatha1: Pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ;
Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;
body.gathalast: Tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto.
body.gatha1: Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
